topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.1: Managing Baremetal

body.p: You can use HPE Helion OpenStack to manage the baremetal region.
As an admin, you can use the dashboards to:
Turn on and off baremetal nodes

ol.li: Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade Horizon Dashboard.

Select the appropriate project and the baremetal region.
The baremetal region appears for Sacramento deployments only.
Click the System dashboard, then the Ironic panel
